To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of 26 - 2 = <<26-2=24>>24 inches.
It will take her a total of 24 / 1.34 = <<24/1.34=17.91>>17.91 years.
Sandy will be 12 + 17.91 = <<12+17.91=29.91>>29.91 years old when she achieves the world record.
